c = input()  # input a char
print(chr(ord(c) + 1))  # add one to the char and print it


def main():
    import sys

    c = sys.stdin.readline().rstrip()

    print(chr(ord(c) + 1))

if __name__ == '__main__':
    main()

c = input() 
print(chr(ord(c) + 1))
